conversations.english: It seldom rains this summer.今年夏天下雨很少。
conversations.chinese: 今年夏天下雨很少。
conversations.reply_english: Yeah, some places are very short of water.就是，有些地方十分缺水。
conversations.reply_chinese: 就是，有些地方十分缺水。

conversations.english: I’m sure it will be wet when we arrive.我肯定我们到达的时候天气会很潮湿。
conversations.chinese: 我肯定我们到达的时候天气会很潮湿。
conversations.reply_english: Yes. I dare say it will be.是的。我敢说会是这样的。
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的。我敢说会是这样的。

conversations.english: Those are today’s top stories. Now let’s go to John for the weather. John, what does the forecast look like for our weekend travelers?以上就是今天的头条消息。现在我们连线约翰，了解一下天气情况。约翰，对于本周出行的人们来说，天气怎么样？
conversations.chinese: 以上就是今天的头条消息。现在我们连线约翰，了解一下天气情况。约翰，对于本周出行的人们来说，天气怎么样？
conversations.reply_english: I’m afraid we’re in for a rough weekend, Marry. There is a storm system moving through the East Coast. It will be drizzling all day today, and there’s a 60 percent chance of thunderstorms this evening. It will be warm and humid all weekend. In the Midwest, expect strong winds and a low of around 40 degrees.玛丽，可怕我们得过一个天气很糟的周末。有个风暴正在穿越东部海岸。今天整天都会下毛毛雨，而且今晚有百分之六十的可能下雷暴雨。周末会温暖而又潮湿，在中西部，会有强风，和40度左右的低压。
conversations.reply_chinese: 玛丽，可怕我们得过一个天气很糟的周末。有个风暴正在穿越东部海岸。今天整天都会下毛毛雨，而且今晚有百分之六十的可能下雷暴雨。周末会温暖而又潮湿，在中西部，会有强风，和40度左右的低压。

conversations.english: Are your ready to go to the supermarket?你准备好去超市了吗?
conversations.chinese: 你准备好去超市了吗?
conversations.reply_english: Yes, are you?是啊,你呢?
conversations.reply_chinese: 是啊,你呢?

conversations.english: There is a tornado warning on. My mother just told me she heard it on the radio.有一个龙卷风的警报，我妈刚刚告诉我她从收音机听到的。
conversations.chinese: 有一个龙卷风的警报，我妈刚刚告诉我她从收音机听到的。
conversations.reply_english: What is a tornado warning?什么是龙卷风警报？
conversations.reply_chinese: 什么是龙卷风警报？

conversations.english: What did you do over the weekend?这个周末你都干什么了?
conversations.chinese: 这个周末你都干什么了?
conversations.reply_english: I went a global warming rally in London. It was fantastic to be around so many people who care about the environment.我到伦敦去参加一个有关全球变暖的集会.周围有那么多人都在关注环境问题,可真是好事!
conversations.reply_chinese: 我到伦敦去参加一个有关全球变暖的集会.周围有那么多人都在关注环境问题,可真是好事!

title: 英国的天气The weather in England

conversations.english: It's a lovely day out today, isn't it?今天外面的天气真不错,是吧?
conversations.chinese: 今天外面的天气真不错,是吧?
conversations.reply_english: It's beautiful. Enjoy it while it lasts. It's supposed to get cold tomorrow.好极了.好好享受吧.明天可能会降温.
conversations.reply_chinese: 好极了.好好享受吧.明天可能会降温.

conversations.english: Nice day today, isn't it?天气真好，是吧？
conversations.chinese: 天气真好，是吧？
conversations.reply_english: Yes, it's beautiful weather we're having.是的，非常好。
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的，非常好。

conversations.english: Man, that sunset is beautiful. I’ve never seen one so red.瞧，日落真漂亮。我从未见过这么火红的日落。
conversations.chinese: 瞧，日落真漂亮。我从未见过这么火红的日落。
conversations.reply_english: Yeah, it’s pretty nice, but its so red because of air pollution.对，很漂亮。可是颜色之所以这么红是因为空气污染。
conversations.reply_chinese: 对，很漂亮。可是颜色之所以这么红是因为空气污染。

conversations.english: The air quality in this city is horrendous! The pollution levels were so high that we weren't supposed to go outside with a face mask again!这个城市的空气质量实在是太差了!污染指数那么高,以至于我们都已不再希望于外出时戴防毒面具保护自己了.
conversations.chinese: 这个城市的空气质量实在是太差了!污染指数那么高,以至于我们都已不再希望于外出时戴防毒面具保护自己了.
conversations.reply_english: Exhaust fumes from vehicles cause a great deal of damage to the environment.汽车排放的尾气严重污染了环境.
conversations.reply_chinese: 汽车排放的尾气严重污染了环境.

conversations.english: Have you ever been in an earthquake?你经历过地震吗?
conversations.chinese: 你经历过地震吗?
conversations.reply_english: Yes, I experienced one when I was in Tokyo once. The tremors only lasted a few seconds though and then it was over.经历过,我在东京的时候遇到过一次.不过那次轻微的地震大概只持续了几秒钟,然后就过去了.
conversations.reply_chinese: 经历过,我在东京的时候遇到过一次.不过那次轻微的地震大概只持续了几秒钟,然后就过去了.

conversations.english: What's the weather forecast for today?今天天气预报怎么说？
conversations.chinese: 今天天气预报怎么说？
conversations.reply_english: Cloudy in the morning, overcast in the afternoon.上午多云，下午阴天。
conversations.reply_chinese: 上午多云，下午阴天。

title: 发洪水了我不得不取消旅行计划

conversations.english: Have you seen the news that there is a serious flood in the South?你看新闻了吗，南方发洪水了。
conversations.chinese: 你看新闻了吗，南方发洪水了。
conversations.reply_english: Yes. I've got to cancel my traveling plan.看了。我不得不取消我的旅行计划。
conversations.reply_chinese: 看了。我不得不取消我的旅行计划。

title: 骑自行车上班很惬意Biked to work

conversations.english: Hey, Jim. I didn’t know you biked to work.嘿，吉姆。我可不知道你骑自行车上班。
conversations.chinese: 嘿，吉姆。我可不知道你骑自行车上班。
conversations.reply_english: Yeah, it helps keep me fit and helps the environment, too.是这样。他可以帮助我保持体形，同时也有利于环境。
conversations.reply_chinese: 是这样。他可以帮助我保持体形，同时也有利于环境。

title: 久旱无雨A drought has set in

conversations.english: I think a drought has set in. It hasn’t rained a drop for months.我想干旱开始了。几个月都没下一滴雨了。
conversations.chinese: 我想干旱开始了。几个月都没下一滴雨了。
conversations.reply_english: I think so too, but didn't it rain last month?我也这么想。但是上个月没有下雨吗？
conversations.reply_chinese: 我也这么想。但是上个月没有下雨吗？

conversations.english: Oh, my! It's really hot. I've never seen such scorching weather in my life.噢，我天啊！天气真热。我长这么大还没有经历过如此炎热的天气。
conversations.chinese: 噢，我天啊！天气真热。我长这么大还没有经历过如此炎热的天气。
conversations.reply_english: Tell me about it! It's like the whole world is broiling.跟我说说吧！整个世界好像在火上烤一样。
conversations.reply_chinese: 跟我说说吧！整个世界好像在火上烤一样。

conversations.english: Wow! You look like a drowned rat! Didn't you know there is a thunder-storm today?哇，你就像个落汤鸡！你不知道今天有雷雨吗？
conversations.chinese: 哇，你就像个落汤鸡！你不知道今天有雷雨吗？
conversations.reply_english: I knew there would be a shower, but I didn't realize it would rain cats and dogs today.我知道有阵雨，但是我不知道今天下倾盆大雨。
conversations.reply_chinese: 我知道有阵雨，但是我不知道今天下倾盆大雨。

title: 今天早上冷极了So cold this morning

conversations.english: Did you hear how cold it got last night?你昨晚有听天气预报说多冷吗?
conversations.chinese: 你昨晚有听天气预报说多冷吗?
conversations.reply_english: I heard the radio announcer say it was 18 degrees below zero.我听广播员说是零下18度。
conversations.reply_chinese: 我听广播员说是零下18度。

title: 天气很好阳光明媚Nice and bright

conversations.english: What a lovely day, isn't it?今天天气很好，是吗？
conversations.chinese: 今天天气很好，是吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yes, it's nice and bright.是的，天气很好，阳光明媚。
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的，天气很好，阳光明媚。

conversations.english: Lousy weather, isn't it?天气很差，是吗？
conversations.chinese: 天气很差，是吗？
conversations.reply_english: It has stopped snowing, but it's even colder.雪已经停了，但是天更冷了。
conversations.reply_chinese: 雪已经停了，但是天更冷了。

conversations.english: Excuse me, Sir, do you know what time it is?对不起，先生，你知道几点了吗？
conversations.chinese: 对不起，先生，你知道几点了吗？
conversations.reply_english: Oh, it’s almost eleven twenty.噢，快十一点二十分了。
conversations.reply_chinese: 噢，快十一点二十分了。

conversations.english: Fairly warm this morning,isn't it?今天上午真暖和，是吗？
conversations.chinese: 今天上午真暖和，是吗？
conversations.reply_english: You're right.The air is so warm and everything looks so fresh and green.是啊,天气暖洋洋的.一切看起来都那么清新,那么翠绿
conversations.reply_chinese: 是啊,天气暖洋洋的.一切看起来都那么清新,那么翠绿

conversations.english: I like this kind of weather.我喜欢这种天气。
conversations.chinese: 我喜欢这种天气。
conversations.reply_english: Yes,a little breeze and a lovely moon.是啊，微风徐徐，皓月当空。
conversations.reply_chinese: 是啊，微风徐徐，皓月当空。

conversations.english: It's nice and bright today,isn't it?今天真是阳光明媚，天气宜人。
conversations.chinese: 今天真是阳光明媚，天气宜人。
conversations.reply_english: Yes,the autumn is marvelous here.是啊，这儿的秋天美极了。
conversations.reply_chinese: 是啊，这儿的秋天美极了。

conversations.english: What lovely weather!天儿真好！
conversations.chinese: 天儿真好！
conversations.reply_english: It's so pleasant after the bad weather we've been having.这么长时间没有好天气，今天可真痛快。
conversations.reply_chinese: 这么长时间没有好天气，今天可真痛快。

conversations.english: Wow, Is winter always this cold in Taiwan?台湾的冬天总是这么冷吗?
conversations.chinese: 台湾的冬天总是这么冷吗?
conversations.reply_english: Not really. It's much warmer usually. Your are not used to cold weather?不见得,通常暖和多了.你不习惯冷天气吗?
conversations.reply_chinese: 不见得,通常暖和多了.你不习惯冷天气吗?

title: 全球变暖你们如何看待

conversations.english: So what’s your guys’take on all this global warming hysteria in the media?关于媒体报道的全球变暖你们如何看待？
conversations.chinese: 关于媒体报道的全球变暖你们如何看待？
conversations.reply_english: It’s pretty serious, man. There have been tons of scientific studies and the scientific community says that the earth is heating up. We need to make some drastic changes to our lifestyle if we want to preserve our planet.那是个很严肃的问题。有大量的科学研究和科学团体声称地球正在变热。如果我们想保护地球，我们的生活方式需要马上进行调整.
conversations.reply_chinese: 那是个很严肃的问题。有大量的科学研究和科学团体声称地球正在变热。如果我们想保护地球，我们的生活方式需要马上进行调整.

conversations.english: Which season do you like best?你最喜欢哪个季节？
conversations.chinese: 你最喜欢哪个季节？
conversations.reply_english: I like spring best. It is neither too cold nor too hot. Freezing days make me lazy and stuffy days make me lazier. How about you?我最喜欢春天。春天不冷也不热。寒冷的日子使我变懒，闷热的日子使我变得更懒。你呢？
conversations.reply_chinese: 我最喜欢春天。春天不冷也不热。寒冷的日子使我变懒，闷热的日子使我变得更懒。你呢？

conversations.english: It seems a glorious day today.看来今天是晴天啊。
conversations.chinese: 看来今天是晴天啊。
conversations.reply_english: I agree....我也这么想。……
conversations.reply_chinese: 我也这么想。……

conversations.english: Look!It's clearing up.瞧，天晴了。
conversations.chinese: 瞧，天晴了。
conversations.reply_english: I can see the sun now.太阳出来了。
conversations.reply_chinese: 太阳出来了。

conversations.english: Hurry up, Daniel, it's Barbie time.快点，丹尼尔，现在是芭比时间。
conversations.chinese: 快点，丹尼尔，现在是芭比时间。
conversations.reply_english: All right, Sis!知道了，姐姐。
conversations.reply_chinese: 知道了，姐姐。

conversations.english: Nice weather, honey!亲爱的，今天的天气真好。
conversations.chinese: 亲爱的，今天的天气真好。
conversations.reply_english: The days are getting longer!白天也变长了。
conversations.reply_chinese: 白天也变长了。

conversations.english: May, we are fools to hang out at noon. It's dying hot today. My skin is too weak to be exposed under the summer sun.阿美，我们选择中午出来逛街，真是不明智，今天太热了。我的皮肤很敏感，不能暴露在夏天烈日下
conversations.chinese: 阿美，我们选择中午出来逛街，真是不明智，今天太热了。我的皮肤很敏感，不能暴露在夏天烈日下
conversations.reply_english: Do you have any sunscreen lotion?你有防晒霜吗？
conversations.reply_chinese: 你有防晒霜吗？

conversations.english: Every year,the South has the floods. It is an act of God.南方每年都发洪水，这是天灾。
conversations.chinese: 南方每年都发洪水，这是天灾。
conversations.reply_english: Do you really think so?你真的这么认为吗？
conversations.reply_chinese: 你真的这么认为吗？

conversations.english: It seldom rains this summer.今年夏天下雨很少。
conversations.chinese: 今年夏天下雨很少。
conversations.reply_english: Yeah, some places are very short of water.就是，有些地方十分缺水。
conversations.reply_chinese: 就是，有些地方十分缺水。
